column4: How do I install Netbook Remix on Dell Inspiron Mini please?<
How do I install Netbook Remix on Dell Inspiron Mini please?  Is there a netbook channel?
How do I install Netbook Remix on Dell Inspiron Mini please?  Is there a netbook channel?
Eh download the cd at ubuntu.com and install it?
You need to tell your bios to boot from the SB card
Yes, but then it still boots XP, even if I select "removable USB device".
Usually you press F11 or F12 during bios image
Indeed, but it still boots XP...
SD card is not removeable USB
But it's not best quality and I'm trying to get it to work.
I can't see it in Windows.
What are you using now on the irc machine?
Windows XP.  My only choice.  USB drive doesn't even appear in drive manager,
Is the netbook only machine you have?
And a laptop and an old IBM PC I'd rather not turn on.
Well it is up to you to find which machine you can use your USB on
